ch.ledcom.log4jtools.log4j.spi
Interface Decoder

All Known Implementing Classes:
XMLDecoder
public interface Decoder

Allow LoggingEvents to be reconstructed from a different format (usually XML).

Since:
1.3
Author:
Scott Deboy (sdeboy@apache.org)
